channel.title: GDACS RSS information
channel.description: Near real-time alerts about natural disaster with a potential humanitarian impact

item.title: Green earthquake alert (Magnitude 5.7M, Depth:70.5km) in Guatemala 15/06/2016 13:46 UTC, 4505508 people within 100km.
item.description: On 6/15/2016 1:46:56 PM, an earthquake occurred in Guatemala potentially affecting 4505508 people within 100km. The earthquake had Magnitude 5.7M, Depth:70.5km.
item.dc:subject: EQ1

gdacs:resource.gdacs:title: Country disaster profile (DesInventar)
gdacs:resource.gdacs:description: This Country Profile shows a set of typical results known as "Preliminary Analysis" comming from the disaster database. Charts, Maps and tables below will provide you with a basic understanding of the effects of many types of natural disasters occurred in the region.

item.title: Green earthquake alert (Magnitude 5.6M, Depth:8.21km) in Antarctica 15/06/2016 06:58 UTC, No people within 100km.
item.description: On 6/15/2016 6:58:26 AM, an earthquake occurred in Antarctica potentially affecting No people within 100km. The earthquake had Magnitude 5.6M, Depth:8.21km.
